segments.text: I'm still looking at this kitchen, and I'm really starting to feel something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink, her face is just so calm and neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing a plate, completely engrossed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so utterly unaware of her surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is pouring water onto the floor, making a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her children are risking injury just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost negligent, this level of distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she have any peripheral awareness at all?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to get her attention immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of reaction is truly infuriating to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and make her look around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation could have been avoided with a little attention.
segments.speaker: PAR
